params._relay: The Relay address to validate data from source chain
params._startingBlockNumber: Requests that are included in a block older                              than _startingBlockNumber cannot be executed
params._treasury: Address of treasury that collects protocol fees

isRequestUsed(bytes32).details: It prevents re-submitting an executed request

params._txId: The transaction ID of request on Bitcoin

returns._0: True if the cc exchange request has been already executed

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._message: abi encode of txId, outputAmount, acrossRelayerFee and Exchange path

setExchangeConnector(uint256,address).details: _exchangeConnector can be set to zero to inactive an app

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params._lockerLockingScript: Script hash of locker that user has sent BTC to it
params._message: abi encode of txId, scriptType, userScript and acrossRelayerFee

wrapAndSwap((bytes4,bytes,bytes,bytes4,u.details: Mints teleBTC for user if exchanging is not successful

params._lockerLockingScript: Script hash of locker that user has sent BTC to it
params._path: (Optional) Exchange path from teleBTC to the output token. This is used if               the default path [teleBTC, wrappedNativeToken, outputToken] not exist or              exchanging using this path fails

FailedWrapAndSwap(address,address,addres.notice: Emits when a cc exchange request fails

FillStarted(bytes32,uint256).notice: Emits when a request is filled for the first time

NewChainIdMapping(uint256,uint256,uint25.notice: Emits when changes made to chain id mapping

NewFill(address,bytes32,address,uint256).notice: Emits when a new filler fills a request

NewInstantRouter(address,address).notice: Emits when instant router contract updated

NewThirdPartyAddress(uint256,address,add.notice: Emits when changes made to third party address

NewThirdPartyFee(uint256,uint256,uint256.notice: Emits when changes made to third party fee

NewWrapAndSwap(address,address,address[2.notice: Emits when a cc exchange request gets done

NewWrappedNativeToken(address,address).notice: Emits when changes made to wrapped native token

SetExchangeConnector(uint256,address).notice: Emits when appId for an exchange connector is set

initialize(uint256,uint256,uint256,addre.notice: Gives default params to initiate cc exchange router

isRequestUsed(bytes32).notice: Checks if a request has been executed before

removeToken(uint256,address).notice: Removing a token as supported token on specific chain

retryFailedWrapAndSwap(bytes,bytes32,byt.notice: ETH user whose exchange request failed can retry          to exchange teleBTC for the desired token

setExchangeConnector(uint256,address).notice: Sets appId for an exchange connector

supportToken(uint256,address).notice: Adding a token as supported token on specific chain

withdrawFailedWrapAndSwap(bytes,bytes32,.notice: ETH user whose request failed can redeem teleBTC for native BTC

wrapAndSwap((bytes4,bytes,bytes,bytes4,u.notice: Executes a cross-chain exchange request after checking its merkle inclusion proof
